channel.title: Pi Webclient Website Sided HELP PLEASE
channel.description:
Hey i posted this because i need some help with the webclient process. I used rics videos and text tutorials . They helped me alot thanks! I have the webclient on my xamp and i can go to it on my computer Http://Localhost/webclient tht is from xamp and i can see my client. I need help adding it to my forums and how do I get others on it? what link do i give them because im pretty sure local host wont work. I have it on my forums but i get A LITTLE RED error message on top left and it says
load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
If someone helps i will greatly appreciate it an you can be admin with spawn rights on my server. The server name is hehe-scape we have 110 votes and multiple players online please help THanKS!

item.title: Pi Webclient Website Sided HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @Dj_Nm.E Dj Nm.E
item.description:
@Dj_Nm.E wrote:

delete all your class files and recompile.

Read full topic
item.source: Pi Webclient Website Sided HELP PLEASE

item.title: Pi Webclient Website Sided HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @king_he_he king he he
item.description:
@king_he_he wrote:

Hey i posted this because i need some help with the webclient process. I used rics videos and text tutorials . They helped me alot thanks! I have the webclient on my xamp and i can go to it on my computer Http://Localhost/webclient tht is from xamp and i can see my client. I need help adding it to my forums and how do I get others on it? what link do i give them because im pretty sure local host wont work. I have it on my forums but i get A LITTLE RED error message on top left and it says

load: class client.class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class

If someone helps i will greatly appreciate it an you can be admin with spawn rights on my server. The server name is hehe-scape we have 110 votes and multiple players online please help THanKS!

Read full topic
